name: Intellect Fortress I
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Occult Adventures © 2015, Paizo Inc.
text: Using the power of pure logic, you disrupt mental attacks. Intellect fortress I suppresses all effects with the emotion and fear descriptors for its duration.
area_zh: ：以你为中心，半径20尺发散区域
text_zh: 使用完全由逻辑构成的力量，你能够扰乱精神攻击。智能壁垒 I能够在法术持续时间内压制所有具有情绪（emotion）和恐惧（fear）描述符的效果。
